articles.title: Banknotes are getting a makeover - and the Bank of England wants your help
articles.content: The first facelift in more than 50 years signals the possible end of historical figures on notes.
articles.personality_presentation:
Bloody hell, this is beautiful! Banknotes are getting a makeover - and the Bank of England wants your help

Look at this gorgeous story: The first facelift in more than 50 years signals the possible end of historical figures on notes.

Absolutely stunning! That's what I call a perfect dish of humanity!

articles.title: Study: 14 million lives could be lost due to Trump aid cuts
articles.content: A new study looks at lives saved by USAID in the past and what the future without the agency will look like.

articles.title: WATCH:  Penguin joins swimmers at the beach in Brazil
articles.content: A Magellanic penguin was spotted at the beach in Rio de Janeiro over the weekend, drawing attention from beachgoers who shared images of the rare visitor on social media.
articles.personality_presentation:
Bloody hell, this is beautiful! WATCH:  Penguin joins swimmers at the beach in Brazil
